attributes.action: Use the Governments Controlling stock power to remove excessive Bank Charges from Banks under the tax payers control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As Tax Payers now own large amounts of stocks in UK banks.

The Government should use its new purchased powers to rethink the Current Bank policy with regards to Bank Charges

They are currently Excessive, Unfair and potentially illegal
